title: HOUR 2 - Right & wrong, Rodgers, Klutch Sports, Pelinka
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Right & wrong, Rodgers, Klutch Sports, Pelinka
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, it's another edition of "Where Colin Was Right, Where Colin Was Wrong." Plus, Tyler Dunne--journalist and founder of Go Long (golongtd.com)--joins Colin to speculate on the future home of current Green Bay quarterback Aaron Rodgers as well as other key Packers from the 2021 roster. Finally, Colin examines the story surrounding Klutch Sports' frustration with Los Angeles Lakers' General Manager Rob Pelinka. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
